title: Developing Language Deep Learning Strategies Through Online Discussion Forum Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and foundational language learning skills (grammar comprehension, basic vocabulary application, reading comprehension)
context.additional_context: Learners primarily use smartphones and possess intermediate-level language proficiency (integrated writing/reading/listening skills). Emphasizes advanced learning experiences applicable to real-life scenarios through civic role-playing.

learning_goals: Learners participate in 3+ online forum discussions applying language deepening strategies (e.g., question expansion, evidence presentation, multidimensional text analysis) and write critical thinking responses scoring an average of 4/5+ on the peer evaluation rubric (clarity, logic, creativity).
Learners analyze group discussion structures and propose 3+ effective communication strategies (e.g., grammar structure utilization, vocabulary diversification, logical expression enhancement).
Learners maintain 80%+ participation in VR-based simulation environments, achieving improvements in task completion and linguistic expressiveness.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
